author: Staff Reporter
text:
Summer rain in Kodaikanal and Sirumalai hills in Dindigul district and Cumbum and Chinnamanur in Theni district has brought down mercury level and offered respite to people experiencing scorching heat. The temperature in Dindigul came down by evening.

The rain will be very useful for long-term, perennial, annual and horticulture crops in Dindigul district.

But the rain would hamper harvesting of second crop in the double cropping area spread across Palanichettipatti and Gudalur in the Cumbum valley in Theni district.
title: Rain in Cumbum
